bio: A supple and slippery character whose pathetic excuses make it utterly impossible to pin blame on him.

soultimate.name: Squirm
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops all foes' stats by 25% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All foes' stats are greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Avoids enemy attacks every now and then.
